content:
[Prev][Next][Index]

Lab Assignments due Feb 8 and Feb 13

  • To: Multiple recipients of list <ics1c@UCI.EDU>
  • Subject: Lab Assignments due Feb 8 and Feb 13
  • From: ICS 1C Instructional Staff <ics1c@ics.uci.edu>
  • Date: Tue, 31 Jan 1995 20:07:32 -0800 
Using http://www.ics.uci.edu/~ics1c/doc/hw2skel.html
as a basis, create an HTML document with the following content:
   1) Your name, e-mail address and major.
   2) Three items of interest you have found on the web
      with a brief statement about each including a link
      to the item.
   3) Five questions that you could not have answered at the
      start of this quarter, that you can answer now along with
      the answers.  Each answer should be at least 80 words long
      and contain at least 2 links to other documents on the Web.
      At least 2 of these 5 questions should be directly related
      to the content of this course and at least 2 others should
      be directly related to your major or (if you are unaffiliated)
      an academic area you are considering as your major.

During labs on Tuesday and Wednesday, Feb 7 and 8,
submit the five questions in text form, using the HTML form
  http://www.ics.uci.edu/~ics1c/doc/hw2a.html
which will be available at that time.

Submit your final HTML document by start of class Feb 13
following instructions that will be provided.

Grading will be on the basis of content and presentation
(including appropriate use of the technology).
Your choice of questions is an important and influential
part of the content.

-- sdf
Stephen Franklin
ICS 1C Instructor
